author: Antoine Tandin

changelog.release_notes: add emery platform

-improve app start and shutdown

- added "Harder" interval
- skip disabled intervals in edit screen.
- fill blank timer name to remove it from selection.

- update to lastest sdk.
- save "interval/round mode" state on each timer.

- improve round display
- bugfix aplite default values

- new parameters for 'back button' on main and edit pages.
- enable/disable inteval sections according to serie value.

- use pebble sdk function to choose text color according to background color

- optim battery life

- bring back application sooner (4s vs 2s) when running in background

bugfix force backlight on down button was not working

description:
Colored circular countdown timer initially designed for fitness sessions.
It's also customisable as a standard timer, interval timer, interval ttopwatch, Pomodoro clock, Tabata or Little HIIT sessions, and more.

Up to 12 timer settings including:
- preparation time (orange segment)
- workout time (green segment)
- harder workout time (purple segment)
- rest time (red segment)
- series count or stopwatch mode
- interval segments and background color
- intervals or round display mode
- timer name
- activity tracker data including step or distance

Timers will vibrate at the end of each segment.
The timer will stop at the end of the last serie in "series count" mode.
Settings are persistent, the timer will wake up on completion if "Series-Timer" goes to the background.

Activity tracker give you a score of movement intensity. You can read the total score on top left. The current serie score is on top right and last serie score on bottom left.

It is a standalone watchapp, doesn't need smartphone connection.

Toggle from round to interval views with long press on up button.

You can change timer names and other settings using the parameter button from the pebble app on your phone.

You can find manual and post comments on http://forums.getpebble.com/discussion/24153/watchapp-sdk3-series-timer-interval-pomodoro-tabata-hiit.
title: Series Timer
